alert.note: Alert for Coastal Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Charlotte County through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of North Port, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Palm Island, Placida, Rotonda and Grove City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
